jobDescription: Veritude is hiring a Data Analyst for Fidelity Investments in Boston MA.  The Expertise We’re Looking For Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in a technology related field (e.g. Engineering, Computer Science, etc.) requiredExcellent understanding of logical and physical data modelsExperience in relational databases especially OracleExcellent understanding of normalization principles and de-normalizationExperience with conceptual data modelsExperience in taking complex business problems and visualizing and simplifying themExperience using Power designer/Erwin to data modelExperience using a model repository to keep enterprise models updatedExperience in Agile methodologies (Kanban and SCRUM)Experience with data movement technologies is a plusExperience developing Rest APIs is a plusExperience in NoSQL databases especially Cassandra is a plus Apply
